help: > about       - Learn more about the creator
> stack       - Check the current tech stack
> audio       - Allows to turn off or turn on all audios on the site
> arts        - Show you a cool arts
> echo        - Repeat what you say (with sass)
about: > I am a passionate fullstack developer dedicated to creating seamless and efficient web applications.
> Skilled in both frontend and backend technologies, focusing on clean code, performance, and user experience.
> Experienced with modern frameworks, APIs, databases, and cloud services.
> Always eager to learn new tools and improve my craft.
> And i a little bit crazy :)
stack: > Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, TypeScript, Angular
> Backend: Node.js, Express, Nest.js, Python, Django, C++
> Tools: Git, GitLab, Babel, Webpack, Adaptive Design, Figma, Photoshop
> Always exploring new technologies and best practices.
projects: > Financial News App   - Angular + Nest.js web application for tracking financial news with responsive UI and server integration. <financial>
> Artworks Gallery     - A single page Angular application for viewing digital art works in a minimalist interface. <artworks>

financial.title: Financial News App
financial.description: Angular + Nest.js web application for tracking financial news with responsive UI and server integration.
